long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you noticed that a large part of your sales do not include UTMs? Ideal for e-commerce, infoproducts and any product with an online purchasing journey. With a user-friendly interface, this tool allows you to easily generate customized UTM scripts, ensuring accurate tracking and analysis for your marketing campaigns.
